'''Malignant Illness''' ''(unofficial name)'' is Chapter 14 of the ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' [[manga]]. It has not yet been localized in English.

==Summary==
[[Barnabas]] confronts [[Amber]] and [[Collei]] and attacks them in an attempt to reactivate the latter's Archon Residue. Amber pulls out her bow and attacks Barnabas, saving Collei from his grasp. As they fight, Collei remembers her memories of being brought to the same man who promised to help her as an infant. Amber successfully dismantles Barnabas, until he activates his dark powers.
